attributes.action: cease to discriminate against white British people by allowng the E & HR Commission to alter other parties' manifestos on which their electorate had voted in favour..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The E & HR Commission are seeking to make a party amend its election manifesto which has been accepted by part of the electorate and which will force it to discriminate against the white majority which voted for it.

rejection.details: The petitions website can not accept petitions about political parties.
